评论详情: If you’re expecting these socks to be warm, like I was, you’d be sorely mistaken. That was my fault for not reading that they’re thin, and they really mean it! These are super lightweight, so don’t expect any warmth from them.  That being said, they are adorable and arrived beautifully packaged in a stylish little box. They’re long enough to wear with boots, don’t make your feet sweat or overheat, and are just really comfy for warm weather or layering with shoes/boots.  Overall, they’re very cute, stylish, and comfortable, just don’t expect any type of warmth. Highly recommend if you want stylish and lightweight socks.  Pros: - Adorable retro design - Lightweight & breathable --great for warm weather - Comfortable & stretchy --easy to wear all day - Long enough for boots --perfect for layering - Cute packaging  Cons: - Not ideal for cold weather
My wife got these for my daughter and they look nicer and fit her well.

The set has a good amount of socks- all have a retro striped fun pattern on them. The color assortment is nice and the socks have the staple neutral colors but also good variety. They're made of a soft material that feels good on the feet. The material is comfortable, warm and breathable. They're good for around the house or wearing out. Not too bulky and good quality. I'd recommend them for the style, variety and comfort.
Comfortable, thick, great quality. Washed up nicely, didn't shrink.

These are my new favorite socks.  They stretch nicely and fit so well.  The material is great quality and don’t stick to my dry feet.  Comfortable for all day wear and wash up very well.  Good value set.
These are so soft. These are my go to socks!
Socks are too small more like children’s than adults

The **HUGSWEET Striped Retro Crew Mid Calf Soft Socks** are a stylish and comfortable addition to any wardrobe. With their sporty and retro-inspired striped design, these socks offer a fun yet versatile look that complements both casual and athletic outfits.  Crafted from a soft, thin cotton blend, these socks are lightweight and breathable, making them perfect for everyday wear. The mid-calf length provides a comfortable fit that stays in place without feeling too tight, while the material ensures a snug but flexible wear suitable for a variety of activities.  The socks' black base with contrasting stripes adds a touch of vintage charm, making them a great accessory to enhance a laid-back outfit or pair with sneakers for a sporty vibe. Their unisex design makes them suitable for both women and men, offering a stylish option for anyone who enjoys a retro aesthetic.  Whether you’re heading out for a casual day, hitting the gym, or relaxing at home, the HUGSWEET Striped Retro Crew Socks deliver both style and comfort. These socks are a fun and functional choice for those looking to add a bit of personality to their sock drawer.
You got to keep enough socks for sticky feet .These are great and some you can even bleach to keep clean. Great deal!

I adore these socks. Perfect height, thickness, and the colors are rich. They are excellent for all seasons, not too thick, not too thin. They wash really well, and if I was blindfolded, I wouldn’t even know there was a toe seam. Great value, would absolutely purchase again, although that won’t be needed for a long time due to the great quality:)

These striped retro crew mid-calf socks feature a fun, sporty design, perfect for women, girls, and men. Made from a soft cotton blend, they are comfortable, breathable, and ideal for all-day wear. The playful stripe pattern adds a unique touch to any casual or sporty outfit. With a set of five pairs, they offer great value and versatility for everyday wear. Whether you're relaxing at home or out running errands, these novelty socks provide both comfort and style in one.
They are comfortable and fit well
Super comfortable.  Outstanding quality! Perfect stretching making for a comfortable fit and keeping my feet warm. Highly recommend.
What’s old is cool again (very nice socks, great quality)
Cute and good quality.  Fit is a tad snug.  The colors are cute and fun!  No holes and not too thick for added bulk in your shoes.
Very nice quality, fit well, comfortable on, wash easily.

I like socks that go up and stay in place. I also like having my feet feel like they are wrapped in a fluffy blanket. These socks do all of the above. To add to the appeal, they have a design that brings me back to my childhood and our old knee high gym socks. The socks hug my feet in all the right places and they are stretchy enough to accommodate my feet when they are swollen. Because the description says they are "Sporty", I thought they would be thicker and more padded, but these are just like a thicker pair of dress socks. They are not bad for light summer activities, but I would not suggest them for sports or winter. I found that the socks would not absorb much sweat during my workouts. I also learned that the cold northern winds will blow right through them.
cute packaging. true to size. comfortable. great length sock for boots
Perfect socks for wearing low uggs or slippers ! Perfect size for my 8.5 feet
Good fit and soft after washing and wearing
These socks are a good price for how many you get but they are a bit thin and aren't quite "dupe" quality.
Nice enough, a tad thinner than I hoped but they work fine.

评论概述: Very stylish and comfortable mid-calf socks that my wife really enjoys wearing.
评论详情: My wife loves wearing warm, comfortable and stylish socks. So, she was pleasantly surprised when I gave her these HUGSWEET Striped Retro Crew Mid-Calf Socks for Women Sporty Casual Cotton Fun Novelty Socks for Women Girls or Men 5 Pairs that I found and requested from Vine. She says that this 5-pair set is a perfect blend of style and comfort, making them one of her favorite pairs of socks to wear. She loves the retro striped design which is so trendy and stylish. She loves how the mid-calf length is just right, offering great coverage without feeling too tight or restrictive and how it helps keep her feet and ankles warm on these colder days we have been experiencing. She loves how these socks are made from high-quality cotton, and you can feel the softness with every wear. She loves how they’re breathable, which is perfect for all-day comfort whether she is relaxing at home or out running errands. And she appreciates the durability—they have held up well after multiple washes without fading or losing their shape. Overall, my wife really loves these socks and recommends them for their mix of quality, design and comfort. 5 out of 5 stars.

the HUGSWEET Striped Retro Crew Mid Calf Socks for Women are really cute, i love the retro look! they are comfortable but i would not consider the toe and heel reinforced. they are pretty thin even with washing them before i wore them. i thought they might plump up after washing but they didnt. i like wearing them with sneakers, but i wouldnt wear them if i was going to be in cold weather

评论概述: Silky soft and no sock rocks!
评论详情: I usually prefer 100% cotton socks, but they can be bulky and don't stay soft inside. Plus the sock rocks, (thick seam ends in the toes) so I end up wearing them inside out. These socks are smooth and soft, easy to pull on (good detail for anyone with arthritis or other mobility issues), don't feel compressive, but don't slide around either. The thickness is somewhere between sweat socks and dress socks. Not flimsy like they'll wear out fats, but not bulky like sweat or boot socks. I think these are thick enough to prevent chafing inside sneakers. These are better than the original tube socks!
Soft and comfortable. On the thin side but that's perfect for me. Great quality material. Great value for the price.
Love the look to these sox! They have that perfect 80’s look! These came so nicely boxed and would make a perfect gift! What I love the most is how soft and comfy they are even with some style!

Great socks, especially when they show! They look good over the bottom of leggings. They are soft and comfortable. Lightweight, not thick on the foot. You get 5 pairs, so more than enough, we split them with the family. They washed and dried good. Seemed like they shrunk a little.

These socks are fun and cute. They are comfortable. They are more elastic than cottony feel. No problem but not so cozy. They wash good, they did not shrink even if I dry them in hot settings. Good enough quality. Good as stocking stuffer.
Nice fitting socks and comfortable to wear. Great with all my ankle boots. They stay up, don't bunch, and wash and dry well. Elastic is comfortable. Recommended.

These socks are pretty comfortable. The fabric is very soft and breathable. The fit is perfect, and there is plenty of stretch so there is no compression. They stay up very well. I'm happy with this set!

I bought these retro black and white striped socks because the description says "for Men". When they arrived, they came in a pink box that said "for women". This doesn't bother me much, but I think about it when I am wearing them in public with shorts. They are soft and comfy. They come up to the beginning of my calf muscle. They stay up for the most part. Not too tight and they don't cut off circulation.  I enjoy them for the most part and they are perfect for anyone's feet.
These fit well and seem like good quality! Would repurchase!

These socks are simply stylish. They are not too thick and they are not too thin. I absolutely love these socks. They are made beautifully and looks great with shorts. Get these socks if you want to be stylish.

评论概述: Well-packaged socks add to any look
评论详情: This is a five-pack of socks designed to be dripping in nostalgia. They are boxed in a cute pink box, which makes them very giftable. These socks are on the thinner side, perfect for a pair of Uggs. Overall, they are comfortable with low compression and fit pretty well.
These are comfortable socks. They stay up - which is a must!
I love these socks. They are so comfortable and the fabric is cozy.

Getting crew socks may have saved me from the dreaded teenage eye-roll! My teen complains that I need to wear socks with my Crocs, slides, and Uggs, so I figured these retro crew socks would be cool enough for him. And yeah—they’re adorable, comfy, and bring a nostalgic vibe that I’m loving!  These socks remind me so much of the ones my dad used to wear (and still does, proving he’s now accidentally trendy lol). They’re on the thinner side compared to typical crew socks from brands like Nike or adidas, so don’t expect them to work for heavy workouts or intense activities. But for casual wear, they’re perfect. They add a fun pop to my outfits and stay put without sliding down.  They’re a cute way to get that retro vibe without looking like I raided my dad’s or son's sock drawer.
Soft and comfortable crew socks, they come in a cute box

评论概述: Listing states 90% cotton, 5% spandex &;5% rubber but they feel more like a nylon blend
评论详情: I had high hopes for these bc the listing stated 90% cotton & I've been having a hard time finding socks in this style that are primarily cotton. Unfortunately, even though they say otherwise, these have a nylon-like feel. Not "nylon" like a pair of tights or hose...."nylon" like a cheap pair of novelty socks. I wear a women's size 8 & these do fit me with the toe & heel hitting me at the right spot on my foot. So, they don't bunch & I do like that part at least. But the feel of them on my skin is off-putting to me. The fit is the only reason I'm giving them 4 stars. The fabric, IMHO, is worthy of just 2.5 star 🌟.
These are really cute, but definitely not the best quality. The material is thin and probably won’t last thru too many washes. The price was good tho so I’m giving them 3 stars

Great socks. I am a men's shoe size 9 and this is a perfect fit. Majority of the time when I buy socks, my size kinda sits in the middle of the range they cover and the heel section of the socks are half way up my ankle. This one is not one of those. It sits so comfortably, it's made for me. I would have liked it to a bit thicker so it's warmer but it's hard to complain when it fits so well.

These are super cute socks that have a retro 70s vibe. Bought these for everyday wear but I don't find myself reaching for them as often. they are a tad too long for me and they do scrunch up creating a "bubble" effect. I realize the colors are a bit vibrant as well so they have to styled intentionally. Quality is okay a bit stiff.

评论概述: Holding up good in the wash
评论详情: I’m usually only purchase Nike or adidas socks with padding but my daughter really needed new socks. These arrived quickly and are holding up nicely. Shes an athlete and sometimes takes her shoes off and walks on the track or in the field without her track spikes on 😭🤷🏼‍♀️ but these don’t have any holes yet and I liked the 80s / 90s look when she wears shorts. Haven’t shrunk, no loose threads. Recommend!

This is a pack of five pairs of ribbed crew socks, three are black with white stripes and two are white with black stripes.  These socks are stretchy and fit comfortably. They hug well enough to stay up, but aren't too tight.  I like that the fabric is not thick, because I find thick socks to be uncomfortable.

I am always on the market for socks, so I grabbed these trendy, striped high socks when I saw them. They are stretchy and comfortable - and what I appreciate about them is their lack of excess material..they are fitted to my ankle/leg nicely and the stripes add a trendy bonus to my attire (which is usually leggings and a sweatshirt). I recommend these socks, for sure ◡̈
Love these socks Cute stripes on soft stretchy fabric 3 white & 2 black Great buy for 5 pair Washes well to
Good quality. The seam doesn’t bother me at all, which is something I’m super picky about.

I’m writing about the black and white option. These socks are great, and are just as good as similar pairs that I paid a LOT more for. I wish I had found these first, because they are indistinguishable from the more expensive brand.  They fit well on my calves. They stay up and lay smooth without bunching up. But it’s also not too tight on my calf either. They also fit nicely in the toe area.  The coloring is good, and the white parts have stayed white even after washing. I wash the ones in blue in color, and the white accents haven’t lost any of their brightness.  Great purchase!  My star ratings explained: 5 stars = Exceptional. I recommend to friends. 4 stars = Exceeded expectations. 3 stars = Met expectations. Satisfied with purchase but not overwhelmed. 2 stars = Failed to meet expectations but usable. 1 star = Avoid
I adore these socks! Not too thick, great crew length and not too tight at the top. Super cute retro feel with the stripes, plan on buying more.

I like the style of these crew socks and they look better on than I thought. They come in a cute box and are packaged nicely. They have a nice give at the top and would work on wide and smaller sized calves. They are good for year round wear. They are super easy to clean and have not faded after multiple washes. I do wish the toes and heels had a bit of cushion but overall they have been comfy and cute!

These socks have a real nice fit.  They are stretchy and comfortable.  I wear a men's size 9 shoe and they are almost too small... but, they do fit me the way I like them.  No bunching up under the toes like some socks do.  They are a thin, sort of nylon like material.  If you like or need heavy socks to stay warm or for rough work they might be a bit thin for you.  I'm retired and wear tennis shoes.  They are perfect for me.  When I was wearing heavy, steel toed boots at work these socks would probably have been a little thin.

These socks are thinner than I thought they would be, so I took off one star. That said, they are still quite comfortable. Not too tight around the leg, and the seam is very smooth/unnoticeable, which is super important in my household. Even my sensory-sensitive kid is good with these socks. ⭐

These are definitely throwbacks! Look just like what was worn in the 70s, just not as high up the leg.  Comfy. Mostly cotton with a bit of stretch. Seem to be holding up (minimal washing/wearing so far, though).  Good socks.

The socks are only about 6 inches long in the foot area, but luckily they are stretchy. The ankle portion, however, is rather right and doesn't give the loose-and-slouchy appearance that I wanted from these stocks.  There's no mention of fabric content on the packaging, and no tag on the socks, so you'll have to trust the seller and take them at their word. The socks definitely contain some cotton and elastic. Whether it is 90% cotton or some lower percentage blend, it's impossible to tell.  I deducted 1 star because of how tight in the ankle they are. They are made for people with skinny legs.

These are cute socks. They took quite a while to ship and be delivered. They fit fine (I wear a women's US 9) and they washed and dried nicely. They stay up well and I like the look. They are on the thinner side, which is fine.
Comfortable lower calf socks. Goes a little above the ankles. Great for kids!

1st off. Even though in the ad it says for mean.  Yeah, not so much.  These socks are in the smaller side.The look and feel cool. The material of medium weight cotton so the socks breath and feel a little cushy.  For the price they are a great value.
So I really like these socks.  They fit very well.  The material is comfortable.  They are just the right thickness for me

Love these retro style socks. I used to wear similar socks back in the 80s so I was so happy to find these. I have large calves so I was worried they may be tight but if I pull them all the way up they fit comfortably. If I leave them sort of scrunched down toward the ankle it is a bit uncomfortable after a while. I prefer them fully extended anyway to see the colors.
No complaints with these retro looking socks. The fabric is medium weight and the tube part has nice elastic. I like the look the most and it completes my style of the day.

I adore these retro socks! They are super cute and a throwback to the 70s and 80s. They are very thin so, for me, intense workouts will not be suitable when wearing them. I plan to wear them casually anyway.  Very happy!

I got the all black five pack. These socks are put together nicely and the cotton is so soft. These hug your feet nicely, I’m a 7 in women’s. They have great stretch and do retain their shape. These look great with my mid top sneakers to show off the striped pattern. You get five pair for under $20 which is a good deal for the quality.
I really enjoyed the color combinations and the length. The socks are really thin and docked a star for it as it feels they won't last after repeated use and washes.
Its getting colder so I have to start wearing socks again . These fit well for the most part just a bit tight. They came boxed nicely and have a simple pattern to them.

These socks remind me of junior high in high school! So surprised and happy they are back. These socks are very comfortable, super soft and very breathable. Just enough spandex for just the right amount of stretch. On the top of the foot the fabric is stitched to allow for good air flow. They are also a good value at $2 a pair. They have washed well and felt even softer out of the dryer. Also come in a cute little gift box. These are definitely good quality and I recommend them.

I am obsessed with these retro socks! I've been wearing them with leggings to the Pilates studio and have gotten multiple compliments on them! My husband loves them, and while I was concerned that they are a bit shorter than I thought I'd prefer, he likes the length as they reach just below my calf and says that makes them more flattering. So I'm all for that! They look tiny out of the wash, but they stretch to my size 8 1/2 foot and I'm super happy with them!

As these socks took over a month to arrive, I was already biased against them. However, I was really impressed with the socks. They came folded in a pink box. I didn’t have to pull out the scissors to fish out a small bit of plastic. The socks are soft and cushy. They fit well but they’re not so tight that they cut off your circulation.  4 STARS: They’re very comfy. I didn’t care about the retro design. Didn’t love it, didn’t hate it.

My wife loves these socks. They are comfy and colorful with the retro stripes on the side. They are a good thickness, too. Not too thick so that they are hot and bulky, but not too thin so that they fall apart. They are breathable but supportive and soft. Wife recommends these socks!

Great socks! First off, I LOVE the retro tube sock look. It's fun and sporty. I also love the height of these socks. I tend to scrunch my socks down some on my legs, but even if I pull these up, they're only lower mid-calf on me, which is perfect. I don't like socks that come up too high. These look great either way -- scrunched down or pulled up.  Straight out of the package, they feel nice on your feet, but after a wash, the fabric is even softer. And the package itself makes these totally giftable. I know getting socks as a gift is almost a joke/meme, but a pack of cool looking socks that presents this nicely would not go under appreciated.

I got these for my daughters because they're "always running out of socks, mom". I'm convinced someone is coming into my house in the dead of night, specifically to steal their socks. But only one, so they can't ever have a pair.  Anywho - the girls really like them. They're not super high that they're uncomfortable. Soft around the ankles and "cushiony" so they're comfortable to walk in all day at school.  They've been washed about 29453702 times so far and haven't faded yet or frayed in any way so I take that as a good sign!

These are nice socks but they are made out of 90% Cotton, 5% Spandex, 5% Rubber so they feel a little less breathable than if they were 100% cotton. The material is sort of like spandex rubber feeling instead of soft cotton. They fit good and don't have any seems or anything annoying bothering your feet. They do feel a little tight around the calf after wearing them a few hours but I am used to wearing ankle socks so it's weird having socks on my legs. I like these but I would prefer a softer cotton that breathes more.

These socks are a total throwback to the late 70s when I was a kid and not cool enough to wear multicolored tube socks. Really. It was a thing back then to rock these all the way up your shins with a pair of shorts  with the racer piping on the sides. I wish that the socks were a little bit thicker, but I think they were manufactured mainly with fashion in mind, and not function. The tops of the socks have decent elastics now, but I can see them giving up after many wears. I am really looking forward to wearing them in the spring and next summer when it's shorts season again! The colors are bright and the material is soft. They're just thinner than a standard tube sock for men. But for women, I think these are perfect.

I wear a shoe size 9, these socks looked small at first but they have a TON of stretch, the material is extremely smooth, and as someone who hates wearing socks, these were actually pleasant to wear. I don’t like that they sit around my ankle, but honestly, they don’t look bad. The box they came in wasn’t anything special, but the socks are going to last me a couple of months easily.

These socks are very thick and warm probably not best for summer but not thick enough to be comparable to wall. They’re cotton socks and perfect for sports. They wick water well and they’re super comfy in my shoes.
I’m adding a couple to Christmas shoe boxes and have handed 2 out to people on the street. They’re a great summer/early autumn weight.  They came rolled up in a cute pink box ^_^

I wouldn't call these cotton.  They don't feel like typical tube socks, they are more of a silky/microfiber feel. They are soft and comfortable and looks nice on.  It's just not what I had envsioned.  They are on trend right now so I feel like I fit in when I wear them, and it's a good set and variety of black and white.

评论概述: Great Everyday Socks That Add a Fun Retro Vibe!
评论详情: I’m really happy with the HUGSWEET Striped Retro Crew Socks. They fit great (I wear a size 8) and feel super soft and breathable. The stretchy cotton makes them comfortable to wear all day, and the stripes add a fun touch to my outfits.  I love how versatile they are. I’ve paired them with jeans, skirts, and sneakers, and they work for both casual and active days. Plus, the quality is solid—no annoying toe seams! If you want comfy, stylish socks, these are a great pick.
Love these socks. Gives a real 80’s vibe. Cute color combos. Nice quality. Good length.

These socks are so cute! You get quite a few of them for the price so they are absolutely a great value! The socks themselves are well made and the colors are vibrant! I would definitely recommend these!

评论概述: Sport, fashion, pretty andd good quality
评论详情: These are always to go. Made of very good quality. Breathable, dont make your foot sweat even after a long day on shoes. I got 5 different colors, so I match with everything I wear
I would call these unisex they are nice quality. Took a very long time to arrive.
Perfect fit. Nice level of elasticity.  Vibrant colors and excellent retro stripes. Hits mid calf.
Great material, very comfortable and durable! They are super soft to wear and hold up well. The white stripes adds a cute touch to my style.

评论概述: Good take on an old staple
评论详情: They come in a box sealed on all four sides. They're comfortable and stretchy and will fit up to a woman's size 9 at mid calf length. They have a toe and a heel and fit snugly on the foot. A little spandex in the cotton makes them soft and form fitting. A welcome improvement on the old staple these socks are comfortable and fun to wear.

Oh yeah these HUGSWEET Striped Retro Crew Mid Calf Socks for Women are the real deal!  Super cute retro-style stripe accented sport socks like these make a casual outfit pop, in my opinion! This set is a GREAT product and I’d recommend this brand for quality and value.  This multipack holds a fun variety of colors, all of which are vivid and well-executed. The socks are plush without being bulky, and the elastic fits nicely and not tight. The toe seams are even good and don’t bother me! I wear size 7 women’s shoe and they fit great with room to stretch for larger sizes.  The fact that they come in a cute box also would make these great for a little cute gift.
These socks are so comfy and soft! I like the classic stripe pattern on them. They come up to just below mid-calf on my legs (I’m 5’2”).

These socks have a cute design, but are pretty thin. I prefer a thicker sock for my gym shoes, but the stripes are fun, and I can definitely wear them in the summertime. Five pairs for 19.99$ is probably a good price. They're great, I just wish they were a hair thicker.

I knew my daughter would love these.  I asked her how she would best describe them and she said they're a cute set of retro-inspired socks in fun colors.  The socks are a little thinner than expected, but they will be light and breathable for warm weather.  They arrived in a box that would work well for gifting.  I'm happy to see these making a comeback.  It sure brings back the memories.

It has a high 90% cotton which is great.  It is comfortable and stretchy and it looks athletic with stripes on cuff.  I also like its toes being seamless.  Comparing with other socks I had in the same price range, I would like its reinforced heal to be a bit thicker.

Vine reviewer here giving you my honest hands-on review and inspection of the product you are considering.  All good things come around again, and these socks have returned! They are totally a throw back to the 70s! Like the old tube socks, these have those vintage colored stripes, but the are mid-calf socks, not long tube socks. They are thin enough to wear with tennis shoes or slides, but they are not made of cheap material either. They are super comfy and super stylish giving that casual retro look. I love the colors, the socks are bright white and look crisp against the different colored stripes.  They come rolled up inside a pink box, which makes gift giving easy. I wish the box was a little more "vintage" so it would look more trendy, more youthful. But other than the color and design on the box, these socks make a really cool gift for a young adult. And for the older person, such as myself, these socks are nostalgic and I love wearing them.

They are just as pictured and remind me of socks from my childhood. They are not thick, but also not too thin. I am going to share them ( divide them up) with my daughter because she thinks they look really cool. They are super cute. I recommend these socks highly.
These socks are so comfy! They fit really well and I can wear them with sneakers and my docs without any issue. They stay up just fine!
These socks are cool looking and easy to match with many outfits/colors. Very comfortable and very cute.

I really like these mid-crew socks. They are lightweight, breathable and comfortable to wear, even on days like today with the heat index over 100°. The HUGSWEET one size fits all socks work even on my size 9 feet. The fabric is stretched thinner over my heel and big toe but that's a given with women's socks on my big feet. I especially like that the tops of the socks are non-binding. Just wish the socks were a couple of inches longer because white socks are my first line of defense against fire ants, fleas and ticks while working outside (I live in rural Florida). When the socks are laundered, I will flat dry them rather than use the dryer in an effort to reduce the chance of shrinkage and prolong the life of the fibers.

These sock are great. They re true to color as advertised and are quite comfortable. They are on the thinner side for socks, but they re durable. The striped patterns are great and unique. I'm really happy with them, strongly recommend!

These look like sweat socks that I remember big people wearing when I was a little kid, but they're not actually sweat socks. To start, these aren't thick socks - they're thin, and comfortable in any sneaker. Also, they're not tall - they're mid-calf length. They look small when you 1st see them, but the fit me nicely and I wear women's US size 9. I like the colors and think they're a nice modern take on the athletic sock look.
